greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, row sums = A005614, the rabbit sequence.
formula: Binomial transform of the infinite matrix with the diagonalized sequence A124841.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
4th term of the rabbit sequence (1, 0, 1, 1, 0...) = 1 = sum of row 4 terms: (1, - 3 + 6 - 3).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 10 2006
